author: sky.cactus
content: Goerli and Ropsten are being deprecated with The Merge I believe (Ropsten is for sure, I think Goerli is as well).  Rinkeby and Sepolia will be the maintained public testnets going forward.

author: potuz
content: if Goerli is deprecated, what will be the testnet with a mainnet-sized beaconchain? We're already lagging behind on Prater.

author: potuz
content: is it going to have a cooked pre-deposited contract like Prater?

author: ballestar
content: Is there any writing supporting that? I've read rinkeby, ropsten, and kovan are being deprecated; with goerli and sepolia to be maintained in the future

author: sky.cactus
content: Ah, sorry.  I think I got Rinkeby and Goerli mixed up.  Looks like Goerli and Sepolia are the future, Ropsten and Rinkeby are being deprecated.

author: potuz
content: Ah that sounds more reasonable, I suppose Prater will continue being the open one and validators on sepolia will be more concentrated in dev teams/EF?
